thread.title: Joe Jonas Reunites With Ex Demi Lovato, Teases Camp Rock 3
thread.title_full: Joe Jonas Reunites With Ex Demi Lovato, Teases Camp Rock 3

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Joe Jonas Reunites With Ex Demi Lovato, Teases Camp Rock 3
text:
Joe Jonas and Demi Lovato Selfie on Instagram Feb. 2017 Joe Jonas Reunites With Ex Demi Lovato, Teases Camp Rock 3 February 12, 2017 A photo posted by J O E J O N A S (@joejonas) on Feb 11, 2017 at 8:37pm PST 
Joe Jonas and Demi Lovato recently reunited, but it's not their picture-perfect selfie that's making fans freak out. On Saturday, the DNCE frontman, who dated the singer back in 2010 , made our Camp Rock hearts sing, when he teased a possible reboot with the caption, "CR3?" This wouldn't be the first time the two have made us nostalgic about their Disney Channel movie. In July 2016, the former costars shared special moment when they sang their hit "This Is Me" alongside Joe's brother, Nick. After all these years, it's great to see their friendship is still going strong. Related:
